### Note
This is a restricted version of the original MindStride: Empowering Runners Through Mental Wellness.

### Strava and mental health
This project has been developed by .... together with the University of .... and the .... group, as a research and support tool for professional athletes. This study aims to understand the impact of sleep and running, on perceived mental health.

### Installing

- Install R and RStudio from [here](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/). 
- Download this package from its [github repository](https://github.com/FilipeamTeixeira/mental_health_project). 
- Open the strava_health.Rproj using RStudio.
- Open either server.R, or ui.R and click "Run App".
